title: Can't Cast Spells - Known Bug??
body:
I have been getting this bug for a while, and it's when I enter the game, I can't cast spells. 

* When I click the 'Enter' key and exit out of it, I can't cast them.
*  I have tried tabbing out, but it does not work. Is this a bug of some sort? Am I the only one that's getting this bug? 
* The only way I can fix it is when I exit out of the client and re-login, and when I come back, the enemy comes back with level three or four.

I have been trying to fix it, but it works for every key in the game [example: q,w,e,r trinket, etc.] that I can't cast. 

Is this a known bug?

replies.body:
It sounds like either a hardware or config issue is failing to receive your inputs.  What happens if you swap your keyboard?  Otherwise, try resetting your config to troubleshoot, but make sure to test it out in a custom game to avoid any penalties:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know if that fixes the issue.

Hi! I went to the file and deleted the **game.cfg** and the **persIstedsettings.Json** files, and then when I had went into a custom game, I had a bit trouble starting the loading screen, **(most likely my internet)*, and it actually worked for me! Thank you so much for replying! :D
Wooh, glad to hear all is well now!  Let me know if you continue to have issues on the loading screen.  Happy to help.  :D
